name: Nexus (itch)
description:
This game is all about talking about life choices that we have to make on a daily basis and how there are obstetrical in the way of these things. I decided to write this game in this way because I had a life changing experience lately that made me realize what are the important things in my life. I wanted to share with the small corner of the world that I inhabit some of these things that I realized. I'm really glad that I am here on this earth and are capable of doing what I can. There Is a ball that reacts to you in analogous to how goals tend to move with your growth and how there are always things that can push back these goals.

Game Features

  • Rolling ball that runs away from you (Reacts to player movement)
  • Narrative
  • Thematic Immersion
  • Try to get the ball
  • Jumping to see further

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to Look

The UI has been updated from the screenshots to add a sprite to them. So the screenshot is not 100% accurate when it comes to UI
